AND a.object_name LIKE '%' || #{tableName} || '%'

SELECT A .object_name "tableName", b.comments "tableComment", A .created "createTime" FROM user_objects A LEFT JOIN user_tab_comments b ON A .object_name = b.table_name WHERE A .object_name = #{tableName}
